mapper.select: select a.*, b.cate1Name from `km_cs_qna` as a join `km_cs_cate1` as b on a.qnaCate1 = b.cate1 JOIN `km_cs_cate2` AS c ON a.qnaCate2 = c.cate2 and b.cate1 = c.cate1 order by `qnaNo` desc limit #{start}, 10;
select count(`qnaNo`) from `km_cs_qna` as a join `km_cs_cate1` as b on a.qnaCate1 = b.cate1
SELECT a.*, b.prodName FROM `km_product_review` as a join `km_product` as b on a.prodNo = b.prodNo ORDER BY `revNo` DESC LIMIT #{start}, 5;

SELECT a.ordDate, c.company, c.prodName, b.`count`, a.ordNo, b.total, a.ordComplete, c.prodCate1, c.prodCate2, c.thumb1, c.uid FROM km_product_order AS a JOIN km_product_order_item AS b ON a.ordNo =b.ordNo JOIN km_product AS c ON c.prodNo = b.prodNo WHERE a.ordUid = #{uid} ORDER BY a.ordDate DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.*, b.cate1Name, c.cate2Name FROM km_cs_qna AS a JOIN km_cs_cate1 AS b ON a.qnaCate1 = b.cate1 JOIN km_cs_cate2 AS c ON a.qnaCate2 = c.cate2 AND a.qnaCate1 = c.cate1 WHERE a.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY a.qnaRdate DESC LIMIT 5;
